explains: v. 寻找；寻求，谋求；请求（帮助），征求（意见）；试图，设法；找出，找到（seek sb./sth. out）；自然地向……移动；<古>去，前往（某地）
wordGroup: seek for v. 寻找；追求；探索
seek out 找出；搜出；想获得
seek advice 征求意见；请教
seek help 寻求帮助，求助
seek redress 要求赔偿；寻求解决办法

sentences.en: We were advised to seek legal advice.
sentences.cn: 有人劝我们找律师咨询。

sentences.en: They have had to seek work as labourers.
sentences.cn: 他们只好找体力活来做。

sentences.en: Students may decide to seek tutorial guidance.
sentences.cn: 学生们可以决定寻求助教的指导。
